channel.title: FAC461 Factory Records Complete Graphic Album
channel.description: Containing background information and podcasts on Matthew Robertson's 2006 book covering the graphic output of Factory Records between 1978 and 1992
channel.itunes:author: FAC461

item.title: FAC461 PODCAST PART 1 OF 2
item.description: Discussing the formation of the label, its commitment to design and its unique approach to the use of catalogue numbers. Featuring clips of Durutti Column, Happy Mondays, James, Joy Division and Cabaret Voltaire.
item.itunes:author: FAC461

item.title: FAC461 PODCAST PART 2 OF 2
item.description: Discussing the contributions of Peter Saville, Mark Farrow, Central Station Design and 8vo, and the birth of the Hacienda. Featuring clips of A Certain Ratio, Section 25, Stockholm Monsters and New Order.
item.itunes:author: FAC461
